import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import 'boxicons' const Alarm = () => { const [currentTime, setCurrentTime] = useState(new Date().toLocaleTimeString("en-US", { hour12: false }).slice(0, 5)) useEffect(() => { }) return (
{currentTime}
00:00
00:00
00:00
); }; export default Alarm;
